duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage enterprise-level ERP projects including implementation, integration, and data migration.
Utilize project management tools and methodologies such as MS Project, Azure AppDev (ADO), SureStep, Agile, and Hybrid.
Coordinate and schedule project resources, generate progress reports, and conduct project meetings and reviews.
Work with global teams and effectively communicate with C-suite executives.
Stay updated with Microsoft Success by Design guidelines for Dynamics 365 Implementations and ensure compliance.
Travel at least 25-30% per year for project-related activities.

education_certification.credential: PMP, ACP, CSM, or other comparable project management certification preferred.
Certification(s) in MS Dynamics 365 F&O preferred.
